cleaned: talk depression anxiety regular open people cutting want friend tell love want kill death favor mankind

text: About the black people can be racist thing on this sub  Everybody knows  this it s not a hot take  And when half the comments are people circle jerking  about how white people are the real oppressed race it makes me pissed  Everybody outside Twitter knows that everybody can be racist Y all don t have to deal with half the shit my parents deal with while working in the south You didn t get your ass sat down at   and  told exactly how to act when pulled over so you don t get shot your mom doesn t make you promise to never wear a hoody outside at night Everybody knows that all people can be racist  so maybe if we stopped treating it like such a  controversial   hot take it would be more accepted

text: The thought of ending it allIve started writing my letter and my noose is ready to hang myself from the tree out back  Im   and have given up all hope   Ive been to the hospital several times and at this point its just embarrassing to go again  I don t want to burden one of my friends knowing they were the last person to talk to me and knowing that there was nothing they could do  I guess this is the last miniscule sliver of hope in me thinking something might change but ive held on to this sliver far too long with no change   The sliver just works its way deeper and deeper like my razorblade has in the past I know it will hurt alot of people to see me go but i feel that if they read my letter they will understand and not hold ill will towards me
summary: I've been to the hospital several times and at this point it's embarrassing to go again. I've started writing a letter to end it all. I know it will hurt alot of people to see me go, but I feel that if they read the letter they will understand and not hold ill will towards me.
